attributes.action: Include endometriosis and pcos in sex education
attributes.background: It can take many years for women to be diagnosed with endometriosis and poly cystic ovary syndrome as people still see period pains as the norm.   Young girls should be taught what is normal pain and what isn’t and how to keep track of their cycle.

rejection.details:
Health, including reproductive health, is already part of the statutory PHSE curriculum. You can read more here:

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/1019542/Relationships_Education__Relationships_and_Sex_Education__RSE__and_Health_Education.pdf
